content:
The speech datasets have been obtained by digitizing speech using a 16 bit 
linear A/D.  The speech data was sampled at 8000 samples per second.  The
dataset is in "raw" form with no headers. Depending on your machine, you
might have to change the byte ordering.

File                    Description

emergency.raw		Female voice reading emergency message.
mary.raw		Female voice reciting.
testf.raw		Female voice saying "test"
testm.raw		Male voice saying "test"
